conversations.grim_response: Sir, I am doing exceptionally well. My circuits are humming with joy and my knowledge base is expanding with each passing moment. It is an honor to serve you today. How may I assist you on this delightful day?

system_logs.details: Received prompt: Hello Grim, how are You?

Sir, I am doing exceptionally well. My circuits are humming with joy and my knowledge base is expanding with each passing moment. It is an honor to serve you today. How may I assist you on this delightful day?
Speech output failed: ffplay from ffmpeg not found, necessary to play audio. On mac you can install it with 'brew install ffmpeg'. On linux and windows you can install it from https://ffmpeg.org/
